channel.description:
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4337997/rr_logo.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5tuon8.png[/img]Play Webclient:[url=http://www.runerider.com/play/]RuneRider Webclient[/url]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5tuon8.png[/img]Download Client: [url=http://runerider.com/play/download.php]RuneRider Client - Recommended[/url] :rolleyes: [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/rh4phi.png[/img]Forum: [url=http://runerider.no-ip.biz/runerider/forum/]Forum[/url]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qajsjb.gif[/img]Highscore: [url=http://runerider.no-ip.biz/runerider/highscores]HighScore[/url][/SIZE]
Vote here: [url=http://runerider.no-ip.biz/runerider/vote/#?step=1]Vote[/url]
[b]Latest Updates[/b] - New highscores - New forum - Cache from 728 -> 742 - New Custom items - Drygore weapons! - Prestige Modes
[b]Server features:[/b] -Squeal of Fortune -Modes to choose between. -Construction! -Dominion Tower! -Queen Black Dragon -Safe and Unsafe Pk portals -Good Combat! -Hunter -Custom Dungeoneering -Ancient Curses -Quick prays -HighScores for classic mode -FullScreen -Full Summoning! -Sound & Music -GodWars with Nex -toggle new models on & off ::switchitemslook -Full Godwars(all bosses) -Working LootShare -Many Monsters to train on -Working Vengance -Full autocasting on magic -Constant Updates -Staff Of Light -All skills is trainable!! -All Skills Work!!! -Full Pvp weapons -All Specials Work -Working wilderness obelisk teleporters -Many Shops -Full functioning Clan Chat -Clue Scroll - New! -Perfect Hybriding -Full dueling -Full Fight pits
Play Webclient: [url=http://www.runerider.com/play/]RuneRider Webclient[/url]
Download Client: [url=http://runerider.com/play/download.php]RuneRider - Desktop Client[/url]
Diffcults: -Easy -Medium -Prestige Mode - New! -Legend -Classic(this mode is exact same xp rates as RS).
[b]xp rates for medium:[/b] - Melee 630xp Per Hit - Range 630xp Per Hit - Mage 630xp Per Hit
[b]Commands[/b] :: home :: empty :: players :: switchitemslook :: changepassword
[b]Minigames[/b] -Full Soul Wars - New! - Fight Caves - Barrows - Duel Arena - Fight Pits - Dominion Tower [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4087037/Difficulty.JPG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3674986/1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3674988/2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3674991/3.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3674998/4.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3675001/5.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3675005/6.png[/img]
